name: Morning Program
description: The morning program is for children 3 and up. The day begins at 9:30am with free play and activity choices including: - art, daily hikes, dramatic play, journals - woodworking, manipulatives, cooking - blocks, tactile play - gross motor movement play
fullDescription: The morning program is for children 3 and up. The day begins at 9:30am with free play and activity choices including: - art, daily hikes, dramatic play, journals - woodworking, manipulatives, cooking - blocks, tactile play - gross motor movement play
whatTheyOffer: The morning program is for children 3 and up. The day begins at 9:30am with free play and activity choices including: - art, daily hikes, dramatic play, journals - woodworking, manipulatives, cooking - blocks, tactile play - gross motor movement play
howToGetIt: Follow the steps on their website including: - Attend an open house - Attend a Prospective Parent Meeting - Submit an application - Schedule a school tour
cost: This is a fee based service.
